name: Pac Man Run
description:
This is a multiplayer horror game, based on pac-man, but in the ghost's pov,  made in unity, with some extra assets like KinoGlitch and Photon. Furthermore, pac-man sounds audio (please nintendo, I'm just a indie game developer, don't process me, I'm a big fan, I LOVE U)

===========================-CONTROLS-==========================

WASD = MOVE

Left CLick = Flashlight

======================-ASSETS & LICENSE-======================

https://www.sounds-resource.com/arcade/pacman/sound/10603/

https://github.com/keijiro/KinoGlitch

=======================-TIPS & TRICKS-========================

The light can save you.

For any problem just ALT+F4 :)

===================-INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS-====================

1. Unzip the file

2.  Open "PacManRun.exe"

3. Enjoy
